Processing

24 Mar 2016
  • processing

Started with processing in beginning of this month. Listened a lot about capabilities of processing language and trust me it wasn`t a lie.
So as always i began with searching something to start with on YouTube and found this Processing Tutorial ,its great to start with. So without delay i am going to share some stuff that i made on way of learning Processing.






Its just basic stuff, as i don`t know about importing other libraries in Processing.js and for a bit complex see this repo, Android and Java Sketches are in the repo.
